appendix.title: Example Configuration for OCFS2 and cLVM
appendix.para: The following is an example configuration that can help you setting up your resources for use of either OCFS2, cLVM, or both. The configuration below does not represent a full cluster configuration but only an extract, including all resources needed OCFS2 and cLVM, but ignoring any other resources that you might need. You may need to adjust the attributes and the attribute values given to your specific setup.
